languages.text: "Вы предлагаете, чтобы Лорд-капитан и направил{mf|ся|ась} в глубины флагмана искать храм культистов? При всем уважении, но шастать по нижним палубам — удел слуг и команды, а не {mf|Его|Ее} светлости".

"Are you suggesting the Lord Captain should go down into the depths of {mf|his|her} flagship to search for this temple? With all due respect, the lower decks are for servants and crew. They are not a fitting place for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}."
languages.original_text: "Вы предлагаете, чтобы Лорд-капитан и направил{mf|ся|ась} в глубины флагмана искать храм культистов? При всем уважении, но шастать по нижним палубам — удел слуг и команды, а не {mf|Его|Ее} светлости".

traits.locale_text: "Are you suggesting that the Lord Captain delve into the bowels of {mf|his|her} flagship in search of the cultists' temple? With all due respect, stalking the lower decks is for the servants and the crew, not {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}."

"Are you suggesting that the Lord Captain delve into the bowels of {mf|his|her} flagship in search of the cultists' temple? With all due respect, stalking the lower decks is for the servants and the crew, not {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}."

"Are you suggesting the Lord Captain should go down into the depths of {mf|his|her} flagship to search for this temple? With all due respect, the lower decks are for servants and crew. They are not a fitting place for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}."

"Are you suggesting the Lord Captain should go down into the depths of {mf|his|her} flagship to search for this temple? With all due respect, the lower decks are for servants and crew. They are not a fitting place for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}."

languages.text: « Seriez-vous en train de suggérer que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} se rende dans les profondeurs de son vaisseau amiral à la recherche de ce temple ? Avec tout le respect que je vous dois, les ponts inférieurs sont réservés à l'équipage et aux serviteurs. Ce n'est pas un endroit approprié pour Sa Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: "Are you suggesting the Lord Captain should go down into the depths of {mf|his|her} flagship to search for this temple? With all due respect, the lower decks are for servants and crew. They are not a fitting place for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: « Seriez-vous en train de suggérer que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} se rende dans les profondeurs de son vaisseau amiral à la recherche de ce temple ? Avec tout le respect que je vous dois, les ponts inférieurs sont réservés à l'équipage et aux serviteurs. Ce n'est pas un endroit approprié pour Sa Seigneurie. »

languages.text: «¿Sugiere que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán debería adentrarse en las profundidades de su nave insignia para buscar este templo? Con el debido respeto, las cubiertas inferiores son para los sirvientes y la tripulación. No son un lugar apropiado para mi{mf|lord|lady}».
languages.original_text: "Are you suggesting the Lord Captain should go down into the depths of {mf|his|her} flagship to search for this temple? With all due respect, the lower decks are for servants and crew. They are not a fitting place for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: «¿Sugiere que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán debería adentrarse en las profundidades de su nave insignia para buscar este templo? Con el debido respeto, las cubiertas inferiores son para los sirvientes y la tripulación. No son un lugar apropiado para mi{mf|lord|lady}».

languages.text: “你是提议让舰长大人下到旗舰深处，寻找这座神殿吗？恕我直言，底层甲板是仆人和船员该去的地方，根本不适合尊贵的舰长大人亲自前往。”
languages.original_text: "Are you suggesting the Lord Captain should go down into the depths of {mf|his|her} flagship to search for this temple? With all due respect, the lower decks are for servants and crew. They are not a fitting place for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: “你是提议让舰长大人下到旗舰深处，寻找这座神殿吗？恕我直言，底层甲板是仆人和船员该去的地方，根本不适合尊贵的舰长大人亲自前往。”

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテンがこの神殿を探すために、旗艦の深部へ行くべきだとおっしゃるのですか？お言葉ですが、下のデッキは使用人と乗組員のためのものです。陛下にはふさわしくありません」
languages.original_text: "Are you suggesting the Lord Captain should go down into the depths of {mf|his|her} flagship to search for this temple? With all due respect, the lower decks are for servants and crew. They are not a fitting place for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテンがこの神殿を探すために、旗艦の深部へ行くべきだとおっしゃるのですか？お言葉ですが、下のデッキは使用人と乗組員のためのものです。陛下にはふさわしくありません」

languages.text: "Schlagt Ihr etwa vor, der Lord Captain solle in die Tiefen seines Flaggschiffs hinabsteigen, um diesen Tempel zu suchen? Bei allem Respekt, die Unterdecks sind für die Dienerschaft und die Crew. Sie sind kein geeigneter Ort für {mf|seine Lordschaft|ihre Ladyschaft}."
languages.original_text: "Are you suggesting the Lord Captain should go down into the depths of {mf|his|her} flagship to search for this temple? With all due respect, the lower decks are for servants and crew. They are not a fitting place for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: "Schlagt Ihr etwa vor, der Lord Captain solle in die Tiefen seines Flaggschiffs hinabsteigen, um diesen Tempel zu suchen? Bei allem Respekt, die Unterdecks sind für die Dienerschaft und die Crew. Sie sind kein geeigneter Ort für {mf|seine Lordschaft|ihre Ladyschaft}."

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan'ın sancak gemisinin derinliklerine inip bu tapınağı aramasını mı öneriyorsun? Saygısızlık etmek istemem ama alt güverteler, hizmetkârlara ve mürettebata ayrılmıştır. {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne uygun bir yer değildir."
languages.original_text: "Are you suggesting the Lord Captain should go down into the depths of {mf|his|her} flagship to search for this temple? With all due respect, the lower decks are for servants and crew. They are not a fitting place for {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}."
